channel.title: Compile Error! Help Please
channel.description:
[b]Hi peeps. I am working on a client for my server, and when i go to compile, like it says in http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,277553.0.html, client.java, it comes up with the following[/b]
[i]javac: file not found: *.java[/i] [i]Usage: javac <options> <source files>[/i] [i]use -help for a list of possible options[/i] [i] Press any key to continue...[/i]
Any help on why???
ty

item.title: Compile Error! Help Please
item.dc:creator: @ThatCrackerZach ThatCrackerZach
item.description:
@ThatCrackerZach wrote:

Okay, go to you’re compiler, Right click on it
and hit “Edit”… Erase Everything and Replace it with this…

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

That Should work for most JdK’s out there, I have jdk 1.6.0_10 and it works perfectly fine for my server.
If you still have any problems Just Message me and i’ll get back to you as soon as possible

Read full topic
